articles.description: Charlie Perry, 25, claims he drunk 20 cans of cider  during a 15-hour bender on Sunday - when England took on Italy in the Euro 2020 final. But last night he told the Sun 'I'm not sorry'.
articles.content:
An England supporting yob videoed sticking a flare up his backside and snorting cocaine before entering Wembley without a ticket last night proudly boasted 'I'm not sorry'.  
Charlie Perry, 25, is s… [+9321 chars]
